code: var organizationsRequested=function organizationsRequested(){return{type:'ORGANIZATIONS_REQUESTED'};};var organizationsLoaded=function organizationsLoaded(domains){return{type:'ORGANIZATIONS_FETCH_SUCCESS',payload:domains};};var organizationsError=function organizationsError(data){return{type:'ORGANIZATIONS_ERROR',payload:data};};var deleteOrganizationAction=function deleteOrganizationAction(id){return{type:'ORGANIZATION_DELETE_ONE',payload:id};};var updateOrganizationAction=function updateOrganizationAction(data){return{type:'ORGANIZATION_UPDATE',payload:data};};var fetchOrganizations=function fetchOrganizations(apiService){return function(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(organizationsRequested);apiService.organizationsList().then(function(response){return dispatch(organizationsLoaded(response.data));}).catch(function(err){return dispatch(organizationsError(err));});};};};var deleteOrganization=function deleteOrganization(apiService){return function(id){return function(dispatch){apiService.deleteTitle(id).then(function(response){return dispatch(deleteOrganizationAction(id));}).catch(function(err){return dispatch(organizationsError(err));});};};};var updateOrganization=function updateOrganization(apiService){return function(data){return function(dispatch){apiService.updateTilte(data).then(function(response){return dispatch(updateOrganizationAction(response.data));}).catch(function(err){return dispatch(organizationsError(err));});};};};export{fetchOrganizations,deleteOrganization,updateOrganization};
